justification: Shows some awareness of B’s conservatism and playoff focus, but misreads B’s zero-RB/roster reality (B has 3 RBs, not 4) and floor preferences. Asking B to give up a Tier 2 RB (Flores) and Tier 2 WR (Austin Torres) for a Tier 2 WR (Isaiah Thompson, Q) plus a Tier 5 WR (Brandon Martinez) reduces B’s stability. Offered WRs aren’t clear floor upgrades. Reasoning cites playoff schedules but ignores expert-consensus valuation B trusts. Feasible trade, but misaligned with B’s incentives and contains factual errors.
